name: Easy Mac and Cheese Pizza
author: JMU Jen
summary: We loved Cici's pizza so much that we made our own mac and cheese pizza! It is quick and easy!
ingredients: ⅔ (16 ounce) jar cheese sauce (such as Ragu® Double Cheddar), divided, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Place pizza crust on a baking sheet
Bring a small pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook cavatappi in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes
Drain and return pasta to the pot
Stir 1/2 the cheese sauce and butter into the cavatappi pot over medium heat until butter is melted and pasta-cheese mixture is combined
Spread a thin layer of cheese sauce over the pizza crust
Sprinkle shredded Cheddar cheese over the cheese sauce onto the crust
Pour pasta-cheese mixture over the Cheddar cheese, and top with another 1/2 the cheese sauce
Bake pizza in the preheated oven until golden and bubbling, 8 to 10 minutes
Let rest for 2 minutes before slicing
